title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 201.1 - Offer of resale of cemetery lots to cemetery corporations
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 201.1 - Offer of resale of cemetery lots to cemetery corporations

State Regulations
(a) Where the lot sought to be sold is
improved, as by a mausoleum, the Cemetery Board will, there being no
objectionable factors, grant approval of the resale upon proof that the
cemetery corporation has refused to repurchase the lot, in accordance with the
provisions of section
1513
(c) of the Not-for-Profit Corporation Law, together with the sound value of the improvement thereon. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 19
ยง
201.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
